Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and partially grey in section, the interior is covered with a dark-grey deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of a large red-painted character.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394929) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394929)
